title: "Symbols and practices for living in harmony and balance"
first_phrase: In this text, the central point is the concept of quintessence, which arises from the harmony and balance of the elements. The text explores practices that help develop quintessence, such as rotating the arms and becoming aware of the breath. The symbols of the rotation of elements and magnesia represent the harmony and higher consciousness that one can achieve through these practices. The text also discusses taking contact with nature and meditating on the Aries symbol to access one's basal energy. In summary, the text presents a series of practices and concepts that help individuals achieve balance and harmony in their lives.
